```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

import os
items= os.listdir('.')
sort= sorted(items)
i=0
pdf_files = []

import tarfile 

for k, file in enumerate(sort):
  if file.endswith(".pdf"):
    pdf_files.append(file)
    i=i+1
    print(i,'.','[',file,'](',file,')','\\')

archive = "provas-calculo1.tar.gz"
with tarfile.open(archive, "w:gz") as tar:
        for pdf_file in pdf_files:
            tar.add(pdf_file)

print('\\')
print('[Baixar todas as provas](',archive,')')
```
